original_title: Sri Lanka rupee closes flat at 290.95/291.05 to dollar, bonds steady
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s rupee closed broadly flat at 290.95/291.05 to the US dollar on Thursday from 290.95/291.10 to the US dollar on Wednesday dealers said, while bond yields were steady.
A bond maturing on 15.12.2026 closed at 10.15/25 percent, from 10.10/20 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.09.2029 closed stable at 11.25/40 percent. (Colombo/Nov21/2024)
